p.span:
In compliance with the order from Indiana Governor Eric Holcomb, West Central Schools will remain closed for the remainder of the school year. West Central staff will continue to serve the community's needs in the following ways.
West Central will use waiver days or planned days off for Mondays and Fridays. We will conduct eLearning days every Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday. This pattern will continue through May 20, 2020.
Student work will be dropped off as arranged with your bus driver every Monday. For non-bus riders, the work can be picked up at the Elementary School at Door C as arranged or on Mondays and Fridays from 1:00pm-6:00pm.
